reviews.review: 非常好的一款游戏，关卡很烧脑，剧情也很丰富，就是听不懂英文。剧情跟过关没有关系，不听一样可以过
Игра прекрасна особенно с друзьями их подстебывать и убивать
one of the most fun games the voice acting is great and i love the co-op
Both campaigns make my brain hurt. also the single player challenge mode is a good challenge against friends
funny humor and good gameplay. would recommend

相比于前作，在剧情、解谜、追逐战等设计上要带感得多。难度略高于1但是也在合理范围内。是非常好玩的解谜游戏，强烈推荐。
不过社区关卡好难啊hhh

Класс игра, но как по мне довольно лёгкая, как и первая часть, но эта часть однозначно лучше первой, но вот
озвучка роботов турелей, как по мне лучше в первой части

친구랑 열심히 해서 미션을 다꺠는 것에 성공했다.
ㅈㄴ 재밌다.
특히 친구 날라오는데 몸대서 막으니 산성 바다에 떨어지는 거 보고 폭발함 ㅋㅋ
Now I only want you gone...
it's portal 2, i dont have anything else to say.
Intricate puzzles, intriguing storyline/plot, amazing script/writing
эта серия игр была одна из лучших что сделали нам valve печально что скорее всего не будет 3 части веть хотелось бы увидить еще раз глэтос и возможно уитли летящего где-то в космосе.

作为传送门1的续作，先来谈一下传2的剧情，各人认为传2更多的是各种反转，“惊喜感”少了很多。不过结局还算优秀，仍不失为一个好作品。在玩法上传2比前代更上一层楼，而且。。。。解谜确实更难一些。。我脑子笨，大后期基本是一关一攻略。
因为用了优化的起源引擎，所以没有很晕。而且支持了联机探索。喜欢传送门IP的一定要入手哦

Co-op is amazing and the community that drives it makes this game have so much life. One of the best sequels ever made period! Humor is top tier. Puzzles are very challenging at times but nothing to crazy. Great ending, Gameplay and Music!
Glados can shut the fuck up and catch this combo
i like the part with the portals
big T H O N K
이런 게임은 진짜 몇없어서 좋고 내가 유일하게 공략 보고 껜 게임

superó en todos los aspectos de su predecesor, lastima que no mucha gente conoce este juego, los mas conocidos son: dota 2, L4D2, tf2 y HL2.
11/10 IGN

In truth, my sister and I have been playing Portal and Portal 2 for years, but only on my old XBox 360. Until recently, that is. The game was awesome then, and it's awesome now. I don't even usually play puzzle games, and I still love Portal 2!
Cara simplesmente uma obra prima não tem outro modo de descrever esse jogo
很好玩，还可以两人同屏玩，只不过要一个手柄，还有智商低于300的别玩，因为我和我朋友的头快炸了

QUE JOGO MARAVILHOSO PQP.
Ellen McLain e Stephen Merchant estão extraordinários como GLaDOS e Wheatley respectivamente, a história foi ampliada, a gameplay refinada e aumentada, a batalha final é epica e o final é lindo.

Que jogo lindo.
Nota: 9,6/10
great game valve, and plus is the best humor
good lore, good soundtrack, comedy is wonderful

Portal 2 is one of the best games ever made, from the continuing story, amazing character development, to the puzzles to solve, and music transcend a lot of games. The bigger advantage is the user created maps, those get you thinking and go farther than the game's own challenges. It is well worth it and more, Portal 2 is an actual gold mine in creativity from the creators and player base themselves.

Really good game. Well detailed. Old but gold.

This piece will give you an entertaining and unique storyline with incredible gameplay mechanics. The tasks you have to fulfill are only rarely challenging but still brought an excellent experience. 
What I love most about this game, though, is the banter between the characters you meet along your journey. 
Play this game with a friend and both of you will have a great time, that is guaranteed.

This is the only game i wish i could forget so I would have the absolute joy of playing for the first time again. 
10/10 is not a good enough score for this game.
This is a game you need to play, period. Worth every cent of its ridiculously low price.
one of the best co-op experience ever had!
